title: Eternal Defender
info:
This song was composed specifically for Forever Party 2016 (http://www.forever-party.net)
With this song I managed to get first place.
I thank very much the organizers for next great party, I thank everyone "rivals" for their participation and big thanks to all the people who have dedicated their lives to an 8-bit machines !!!
Thank you all for this, I hold you all fingers crossed and I'm with you....TODAY IS EACH OF US THE WINNER. THX !!!

Your Pinky (hard Lamer :-) )

- Platform: ZX Spectrum
- Type of music: AY chip
- Editor: Vortex Tracker
- Stereo Format: ACB
- Format for download: MP3 (10,2 MB)

Caution !!!
If it encounters you have any questions, comments or need any technical support, please contact me !!!
Email: lamer.pinky@windowslive.com
Facebook: Petr Pinky Klusal
Twitter: Lamer Pinky
Phone numb.: (+420) 732 424 922 (Czech republic)

Thank you so much for listening !! Speccy rulezzz 4ever !! :-)
